a9c69759-3df3-4fa1-9c96-133b8831595a.description: The Six Sigma Green Belt course teaches strategies for making better business decisions. This course helps the individual to strengthen their organization by understanding, interpreting, and using the core concepts of Six Sigma. Six Sigma Green Belt helps develop critical skills required for successful project management.

badge_template_activities.title: The Six Sigma Green Belt course project utilizes the Six Sigma methodology and tools for continuous improvement of a real-life healthcare problem. The project allows the student to practice the real-world application of Six Sigma tools as they are learned in the course. The object of this project is to provide a basic understanding of the appropriate and practical use of Six Sigma methodology and tools to make processes more effective by the reduction of defects and variation.

The individual learns to operate more efficiently by increasing value, eliminating waste and streamlining flow. Lean Six Sigma techniques help professionals in both service and manufacturing industries.

The Lean Six Sigma Black Belt helps the individual to ask the right questions and get the right answers. This course is a mastery of Six Sigma techniques and strategies which help in leading top-quality improvement projects. Lean Six Sigma Black Belt is revered as one of the most useful business credentials today.

This course is designed to help the individual master the interpersonal and professional skills needed to mentor Black Belt leaders and lead enterprise-wide initiatives. The course provides an understanding of advanced experiment design methods and strategies for efficiently deploying Lean Six Sigma within an organization, and will review the relationship between the industry, customer and supplier.

In the project students practice a real-world application of Lean Six Sigma methodology and tools at the most advanced level. They work to improve customer satisfaction in a fast food restaurant. Tools utilized include strategic and quality planning, process capability, control charting, regression, analysis of variance, cost of quality, and value stream mapping. The project objective is to provide a master level understanding of the appropriate and practical use of Lean Six Sigma methodology.

83c843b0-8f08-4efe-811a-b28a6c15cabc.description: In this course, students explore the role of technology in education and examine various instructional technologies and media used in the eLearning environment. Students learn how to apply technology integration models in selection, design, and development of instructional technologies and media to achieve learning outcomes and promote learning experience. Further, students develop skills in utilizing technology to enhance communication and collaboration in consideration of learning equity.

9a6e10b5-6514-4757-ba03-d943881ccced.description: The course is designed around program and course evaluation being one of the key steps in determining the effectiveness of teaching and continuous improvement of the learning experience. In this course, students explore various evaluation models, principles, and practices employed conducting Instructional Design evaluation. In this course, students evaluate and measure the entire instructional design process within various contexts to determine the accomplishment of learning outcomes.

39df27f4-f11e-4ac3-9c03-db1de5a22b62.description: This course introduces learners to the conceptual and theoretical foundations of learning design. It explores the history of learning design, learning design models, and foundational theories and principles of adult and online learning. It also introduces the fundamentals of designing high quality online learning experiences by considering course alignment, learning outcomes, engaging online activities and assessment. Students learn online teaching practices and the relationship to technology.
